name: part_008
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei 日本武道館 Live ＂SuperNova＂ [_o_mtN68KEg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei performs the song "Michizure" at her Budokan live concert.
MC section where Hoshimachi Suisei greets the audience and performs her signature introduction.

subtitles.original: 消えきった太陽に見放されて
subtitles.english: Abandoned by the freezing sun

subtitles.original: ずっと縛り付けられている星の上
subtitles.english: Eternally tied down to the top of this star

subtitles.original: 逆らってメッセージが流れ出して
subtitles.english: A defiant message begins to flow

subtitles.original: 街の上で砕けていく
subtitles.english: Shattering over the streets

subtitles.original: きっと誰もただ一人で
subtitles.english: Surely everyone is all alone

subtitles.original: 拳を握りながら 藻掻きながら泣いてるんだ
subtitles.english: Crying as they clench their fists and struggle

subtitles.original: 「愛してる」「大嫌い」「大好き」
subtitles.english: "I love you," "I hate you," "I love you"

subtitles.original: だって重いくらいの想いが溢れる
subtitles.english: Because feelings as heavy as my thoughts overflow

subtitles.original: 今日も矛盾して咲いてくこの感情が
subtitles.english: These emotions that bloom in contradiction again today

subtitles.original: 音の中で初めて光り合うんだね
subtitles.english: Begin to shine for the first time within the sound

subtitles.original: 歌の中で初めて響き出すんだね
subtitles.english: Begin to resonate for the first time within the song

subtitles.original: 冷めきった対応と並んだ表情に
subtitles.english: To the cold treatment and expressionless faces

subtitles.original: 臆病になってた街の上
subtitles.english: I became cowardly over the streets

subtitles.original: 叶わない暴力と史上稀な重力に
subtitles.english: By invincible violence and extremely rare gravity

subtitles.original: 名前も何も決め付けられている
subtitles.english: My name and everything else is already decided

subtitles.original: なんてどこかで吐いた言い訳が
subtitles.english: Such excuses spat out somewhere

subtitles.original: 声を奪ったまま荷物みたいになってたんだ 今更
subtitles.english: Took away my voice and became like baggage, after all this time

subtitles.original: 変われない 分かってよ 信じて 嘘つき
subtitles.english: Can't change, understand me, believe me, liar

subtitles.original: 嫌になるくらいの想いが渦巻く
subtitles.english: Feelings that make me sick are swirling

subtitles.original: 今日も振り回されてく無力な足が
subtitles.english: Today again, my powerless legs are being dragged along

subtitles.original: 飛び上がる準備をしてる
subtitles.english: Preparing to take flight

subtitles.original: 何もかも反発して 崩壊して滲んでいく
subtitles.english: Everything repels, collapses, and blurs

subtitles.original: みんなの歌声聴かせてください！
subtitles.english: Everyone, let me hear your voices!

subtitles.original: Clap clap!
subtitles.english: Clap clap!

subtitles.original: 否定したい 信じたい 嘘だよ そうだよ
subtitles.english: I want to deny, I want to believe, it's a lie, that's right

subtitles.original: 嫌いじゃない 好きじゃない 全部が 一つが
subtitles.english: I don't hate, I don't love, all of it, just one thing

subtitles.original: 変わりたい 分かりたい どうしよう どうしよう
subtitles.english: I want to change, I want to understand, what should I do, what should I do

subtitles.original: 聴かせない 聴かせて
subtitles.english: I won't let you hear, let me hear

subtitles.original: 伝えたい「愛してる」「大嫌い」「大好き」
subtitles.english: I want to tell you, "I love you," "I hate you," "I love you"

subtitles.original: だって重いくらいの想いの先まで
subtitles.english: Because beyond the feelings as heavy as my thoughts

subtitles.original: 今日もまた歌い叫んでるこの感情が
subtitles.english: These emotions that I'm singing and screaming out again today

subtitles.original: 音の中で初めて光り合うまで
subtitles.english: Until they begin to shine within the sound

subtitles.original: あなたのその胸で響き出すまで
subtitles.english: Until they begin to resonate in your heart

subtitles.original: 「愛してる」
subtitles.english: “I love you”

subtitles.original: 「大嫌い」
subtitles.english: “I hate you”

subtitles.original: 「嘘だよ」
subtitles.english: “It's a lie”

subtitles.original: 「大好き」
subtitles.english: “I love you”

subtitles.original: ということで、皆さん、こんにちは！
subtitles.english: And with that, hello everyone!

subtitles.original: では、いつもの挨拶いかせていただきます。
subtitles.english: Now, let's go with the usual greeting.

subtitles.original: お！彗星の如く現れたスターの原石！バーチャルアイドルの星街すいせいです！
subtitles.english: O! A diamond in the rough, polished to shine like a comet! I'm virtual idol Hoshimachi Suisei!

subtitles.original: すいちゃんはー！
subtitles.english: Sui-chan is—!
